summary: This is an email chain from April 2020 between FBI personnel discussing coordination regarding a separate investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails focus on obtaining contact information for Larry Visoski's attorney, Donnie Murrell, and coordinating communication to avoid contacting the attorney prematurely.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.role: Individual whose attorney is being sought
persons.context: Mentioned as the person whose attorney's contact information is needed for a separate investigation related to Epstein.

persons.name: Donnie Murrell
persons.context: Identified as the attorney for Larry Visoski, with his law firm and contact details provided in the email.

connections.description: Donnie Murrell is identified as the attorney representing Larry Visoski.

events.title: Request for Attorney Contact Information
events.description: An email is sent requesting the name and contact information for Larry Visoski's attorney for a separate investigation where Visoski's name came up.

events.title: Coordination Request on Epstein-Related Investigation
events.description: An email indicates the team was unaware of a separate case also investigating Epstein and requests coordination with that investigation team, asking to delay contact with Visoski's attorney until a discussion occurs.

keyFacts: In April 2020, FBI personnel were coordinating on a separate investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein that involved Larry Visoski.
The FBI team was initially unaware this separate case was Epstein-related and sought to get up to speed quickly.
Donnie Murrell was identified as the attorney for Larry Visoski, with his contact details shared among agents.
A directive was given to not contact Visoski's counsel until all teams had a chance to coordinate.
